News.headline: Match Preview: Braintree Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Preview: Braintree Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Braintree Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League Essex derby away match against Braintree Town on Boxing Day
News.description:
Whilst the Daggers struggle at home, the team will be looking to make it four league away wins on the trot after victories against York, Maidstone and Dover.

The Daggers opponents Braintree currently sit one place above the relegation zone on goal difference. The Iron are unbeaten in their last four league matches.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Daggers 4-4 Solihull Moors
Daggers 1-2 Worthing
Dover 1-2 Daggers
Daggers 0-1 Torquay United
Daggers 1-4 Barrow

Braintree
Boreham Wood 0-1 Braintree
Gateshead 1-1 Braintree
Braintree 2-0 Torquay
Millwall 5-2 Braintree (FA Cup)
Southport 4-5 Braintree

Team News
The Daggers are still without a number of players for their Boxing Day Essex derby match. Okenabirhie, Robson, Williams, Howell, Pennell, Ling and Robinson are all set to miss out.

Previous Meetings
This will be the first meeting between the two teams in the league.

Fixtures
There is a full list of Vanarama National League fixtures this Monday. All 3:00pm KOâ€™s unless stated.

Braintree V Dagenham and Redbridge
Bromley V Sutton
Dover V Maidstone
Guiseley V Lincoln
North Ferriby V York (12:30 KO)
Torquay V Forest Green
Tranmere V Macclesfield
Wrexham V Southport

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website
